title: Tab Layout (Item)
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-tab-layout

The Tab Layout app provides you the needed structure to create different layouts within the store's main one from the use of *tabs*.

![Mandatory](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Mandatory-red.png) Defines the rendering for a given tab. Notice that it does not define the tab content, which is handled by the `tab-content.item` block.

`"vtex.tab-layout@0.x"`

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

tabId.markdownDescription:
`string`

Tab ID of your choosing. It will be used to match the tab to its content (defined by the `tab-content.item` block).

label.markdownDescription:
`string`

Tab ID of your choosing. It will be used to match the tab to its content (defined by the `tab-content.item` block).

defaultActiveTab.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Defines the item as the default active tab.
